title: Goldman Clients Take More ‘Cautious Posture’ After November Rout
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s clients are pulling back their bullish views on artificial intelligence and US stocks following last month’s slide, with fresh survey data showing expectations for the S&P 500 turned much more conservative heading into 2026.
content: Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s clients are pulling back their bullish views on artificial intelligence and US stocks following last month’s slide, with fresh survey data showing expectations for the S&P 500 turned much more conservative heading into 2026.
